List of claudin low related genes according to http://cancerres.aacrjournals.org/content/77/9/2213 (done in patient tumors)

CD24
CDC20
CDH3
ERBB2
FOXA1
GRB7
PTTG1

DSP

ERBB3
ESRP1
EVI2A
F11R

GATA3
GNG11
GRHL2
JUP
KRT19
KRT8
LEPRE1
LHFP

MPP1
NT5E
